sentences.sentence: As tensions in the Middle East continue to mount, top US diplomat Antony Blinken will make his fourth visit to the region since the war in Gaza began.

sentences.sentence: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken is set to make his fourth visit to the Middle East since war broke out in Gaza.

sentences.sentence: His latest trip comes as regional tensions continue to mount.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The U.S. State Department said on Thursday that Blinken will try to step up efforts to avoid the war in Gaza spilling over into other countries.

sentences.sentence: He will also work on ways to ensure the provision of humanitarian aid to the Palestinian enclave.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: He believes we need to make progress on continuing to try to keep the conflict from escalating, which is why he's returning to the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Blinken's visit also comes after the Islamic State group claimed responsibility for two suicide bombings that targeted a commemoration for Iranian General Qasem Soleimani in Iran.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Some household power lines were also damaged and a local railway lost electricity. The attack comes as Washington accused Moscow of using North Korean missiles to strike Ukraine back in December.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In Kyiv, mourners gathered for the funeral of a well-known Ukrainian sniper. Rosty Aslav Tyshenko, known as Jerry, died in December last year. He was part of the Azov battalion for three years and returned to Ukraine in February 2022 after Russia's invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile in Washington, the White House said it has evidence Russia has used North Korean ballistic missiles against Ukraine and that Moscow also wants to buy Iranian missiles.

sentences.sentence: Our information indicates that the Democratic People's Republic of Korea recently provided Russia with ballistic missile launchers and several ballistic missiles. On the 30th of December 2023, Russian forces launched at least one of these North Korean ballistic missiles into Ukraine. Also on Thursday, the United Nations Secretary General Antonio Guterres welcomed the exchange of some 230 Ukrainian and almost 250 Russian prisoners of war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Europe's longest-reigning living monarch, Queen Margaretha II of Denmark, took her last official golden carriage ride through Copenhagen on Thursday, ahead of her abdication set for the 14th of January.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Thousands braved the freezing temperatures, strong wind, snow and sleet to catch a glimpse of the Queen in what's set to be her last public appearance as monarch.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Her abdication will mark the end of her 52-year reign. The 83-year-old will hand the throne to her eldest son, Crown Prince Frederick.

sentences.sentence: Previously sealed court documents revealing the names of those connected to the late millionaire philanthropist and convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein have been made public. It's part of a lawsuit related to his former girlfriend Ghislaine Maxwell. However, the documents largely mention figures whose names were already known, including high-profile friends of Epstein's and victims who have spoken publicly. Those named are not accused of wrongdoing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Almost five decades after his sudden death, the king of rock and roll is heading back to the stage. A life-sized, AI-generated version of Elvis Presley will feature in an immersive live show to open in London from November, before moving to other cities around the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The hologram projection of the blue suede shoes singer is created from thousands of personal photos and home video footage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The so-called Elvis Evolution show is billed as a celebration of the star's unique talent and musical legacy.
